1.name: Show Boat
1.description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened when his luck turns sour.

2.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
2.description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

3.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
3.description: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

4.name: The African Queen
4.description: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

5.name: Alice in Wonderland
5.description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

6.name: Along the Great Divide
6.description: A U.S. Marshall and two deputies rescue a cattle rustler from a lynch mob led by a local cattle baron convinced that the rustler also killed his son.

7.name: Strangers on a Train
7.description: A psychotic socialite attempts to force a professional tennis star to prove a theory that two complete strangers can get away with murder.

8.name: The Thing from Another World
8.description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

9.name: An American in Paris
9.description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

10.name: Captain Horatio Hornblower R.N.
10.description: During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.

11.name: The Man in the White Suit
11.description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

12.name: Atoll K
12.description: Stan inherits a yacht and a South Pacific island. Ollie and Stan sail there with 2 other men. They shipwreck on a new atoll and settle there. An ex-fiancee joins them. They declare an independent nation and problems arise.

13.name: As Young as You Feel
13.description: A 65-year-old printer hatches an elaborate scheme to avoid forced retirement.

14.name: Quo Vadis
14.description: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

15.name: A Place in the Sun
15.description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

16.name: Ace in the Hole
16.description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to re-jump start his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

17.name: The Tragedy of Othello: The Moor of Venice
17.description: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

18.name: The Secret of Convict Lake
18.description: In 1871 a convict escapes, with other prisoners, to kill the man that framed him, but has second thoughts after meeting the man's beautiful future wife.

19.name: The Quiet Woman
19.description: Coastal pub proprietress is inveigled into a smuggling plot.

20.name: Scrooge
20.description: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by three ghosts on Christmas Eve...

21.name: David and Bathsheba
21.description: After King David sees the beautiful Bathsheba bathing from the palace roof, he enters into an adulterous affair which has tragic consequences for his family and Israel.

22.name: No Highway
22.description: An aeronautical engineer predicts that a new model of plane will fail catastrophically and in a novel manner after a specific number flying hours.

23.name: When Worlds Collide
23.description: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

24.name: Royal Wedding
24.description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

25.name: Detective Story
25.description: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

26.name: The Prowler
26.description: When Susan Gilvray reports a prowler outside her house police officer Webb Garwood investigates and sparks fly. If only her husband wasn't in the way.

27.name: Pool of London
27.description: When their ship docks the crew disembark as usual to pick up their lives in postwar London. For one of them his petty smuggling turns more serious when he finds himself caught up with a robbery in the City.

28.name: The Lavender Hill Mob
28.description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

29.name: The Red Badge of Courage
29.description: Truncated adaptation of Stephen Crane's novel about a Civil War Union soldier who stuggles to find the courage to fight in the heat of battle.

30.name: Tomahawk
30.description: In 1866 Wyoming, a frontier scout tries to prevent a war between the Sioux and the U.S. when the Army builds a road and a fort on territory previously ceded to the Sioux by treaty.

31.name: Journal d'un curé de campagne
31.description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

32.name: His Kind of Woman
32.description: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

33.name: On Dangerous Ground
33.description: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

34.name: Halls of Montezuma
34.description: A company of Marines races against the clock to find a Japanese rocket base.

35.name: Sommarlek
35.description: A lonely woman recalls her first love thirteen years prior during a brief summer vacation.

36.name: People Will Talk
36.description: Dr. Noah Praetorius falls in love with Debra, a student who finds out that she is pregnant by her old boyfriend.

37.name: Force of Arms
37.description: During World War II in Italy, an American sergeant and WAC lieutenant take time out for romance.

38.name: Fourteen Hours
38.description: An unhappy man threatens suicide by standing on the ledge of a high-rise building for 14 hours.

39.name: The Strip
39.description: Drummer Stanley Maxton moves to Los Angeles with dreams of opening his own club, but falls in with a gangster and a nightclub dancer and ends up accused of murder.

40.name: The River
40.description: Three adolescent girls growing up in Bengal, India, learn their lessons in life after falling for an older American soldier.

41.name: Cry Danger
41.description: Ex-con Rocky Mulloy seeks the real culprit in the crime he was framed for, in a night world of deceptive dames and double crosses.

42.name: Rawhide
42.description: A stagecoach stop employee and a stranded woman traveller find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws intent on robbing the next day's gold shipment.

43.name: The Desert Fox: The Story of Rommel
43.description: The story of the final years of the respected World War II German general, Erwin Rommel.

44.name: Distant Drums
44.description: After destroying a Seminole fort, American soldiers and their rescued companions must face the dangerous Everglades and hostile Indians in order to reach safety.

45.name: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
45.description: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

46.name: Death of a Salesman
46.description: An over-the-hill salesman faces a personal turning point when he loses his job and attempts to make peace with his family.

47.name: Operation Pacific
47.description: During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.

48.name: Westward the Women
48.description: A trail guide escorts a group of women from Chicago to California to marry men that have recently began settling there.

49.name: Let's Make It Legal
49.description: The nearly-final divorce of the Halsworths suddenly gets complicated when Miriam's old flame comes to town.

50.name: Fort Worth
50.description: Civil War veteran and former newspaper man Ned Britt returns back to Fort Worth after the war is over and finds himself fighting an old friend who's grown ambitious.
